blogPost.excerpt: Airdocs is a document generation service for Airtable. Create smart, beautiful-looking documents from your data. The drag-and-drop designer gives you ultimate control of your documents. Send your documents to another app or store them back in Airtable.
blogPost.body: Airdocs is a document generation service for Airtable. Create smart, beautiful-looking documents from your data. The drag-and-drop designer gives you ultimate control of your documents. Send your documents to another app or store them back in Airtable.
blogPost.title: Airdocs - Generate documents from Airtable
blogPost.author: Josh Mamroud

localize.description: Airdocs 是 Airtable 的文档生成服务。从您的数据中创建智能、美观的文档。拖放式设计器让您可以对文档进行终极控制。将您的文档发送到另一个应用程序或将它们存储回 Airtable 中。
Airdocs 是 Airtable 的文檔生成服務。從您的數據中創建智能、美觀的文檔。拖放式設計器讓您可以對文檔進行終極控制。將您的文檔發送到另一個應用程序或將它們存儲回 Airtable 中。
